title: Episode 145: Tom and Erika Girardi, The Hustler and the Housewife - Part 2
description:
She's an enigma wrapped in a riddle and cash - that has been allegedly taken from the pockets of the victims of tragedy. With her husband and his firm under investigation, and his so-called house of cards collapsing, the realest of housewives dropped an election day bombshell - she was filing for divorce. But was it due to years of mistreatment as she said? Or, was it really a sham meant to keep her hands on that precious cash to fund her lavish lifestyle? 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
